snippet: Seven white wines from the largely cool 2011 growing season on Long Island offer thirst-slaking relief on hot days.
abstract: Howard G Goldberg reviews seven white wines from wineries on Long Island (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: Seven white wines from the largely cool 2011 growing season on Long Island offer thirst-slaking relief on hot days.

headline.seo: Seven 2011 White Wines, Fit for the Hot Season
